mapper.select: select (select name from ldcom where trim(comcode) = a.manage_com) manage_com, (select name from la_branch_group where branch_series = a.new_branch_series) new_branch_series, cont_no, agent_code, (select name from la_agent where agent_code = a.agent_code) agent_code_name, new_agent_code, (select name from la_agent where agent_code = a.new_agent_code) new_agent_code_name, update_time, (select nick_name from sys_user su where su.user_id = a.update_by) update_by_name, branch_type, state from la_pre_toll_pol a ${ew.getCustomSqlSegment}
